result.execSummary:
The defendant Jesseca K Mericle was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jesseca K Mericle is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jesseca K Mericle was found guilty of Neglecting a Child (Specified Harm Did Not Occur), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.21(2).
  • Jesseca K Mericle was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Notice of right to seek postconviction relief

Defendant in court with Attorney Steven W. Zaleski.  Will R Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Jt: plea cts 1, 3. DISM ct 2. 18 months probation. Argument. Statement by DE. DNA on file. 

  Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count(s) 1, 3.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count # 2  . 

  Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #   1, 3
Court withholds sentence and places the Defendant on Probation for 18 months, cc to each other

CONDITIONS:


-Not use/possess alcohol, drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without valid prescription

-DNA on file

-Undergo AODA assessment and follow through with recommended treatment per Agent

-Compliance with all court orders in all Dane County cases.

COURT COSTS:
Ct # 1, 3
- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due w/in 60 days. Payment plan approved

-Bond posted to be applied to fines and cc only and remainder returned to poster.

-Days credit for time already served:  0
-Days credit if revoked: 0

DE advised of post-conviction rights

Copy of minutes emailed to DOC.

Becky K
